mapper.select:
SELECT t1.facility_id facilityId, t1.task_id taskId, '' entrustName, t3.cid cid, t3.factory_no factoryNo, t3.facility_name facilityName, t3.facility_type facilityType, t3.model model, t3.accuracy accuracy, t3.test_range testRange, (select t4.last_real_price from tb_facility t4 where t4.id = t1.facility_id) expectPrice FROM tb_task_facility t1, tb_facility t3 WHERE t1.task_id=#{taskId} AND not exists (select 1 from tb_enforce_entrust_facility t2 where t2.task_id = t1.task_id and t2.facility_id = t1.facility_id) AND t1.facility_id = t3.id
union all SELECT t1.facility_id facilityId, t1.task_id taskId, (select t2.name from tb_enforce_entrust t2 where t2.id = t1.entrust_id) entrustName, t1.cid cid, t3.factory_no factoryNo, t3.facility_name facilityName, t3.facility_type facilityType, t3.model model, t3.accuracy accuracy, t3.test_range testRange, t1.expect_price expectPrice FROM tb_enforce_entrust_facility t1, tb_facility t3 WHERE t1.facility_id = t3.id AND t1.entrust_id = #{entrustId}
mapper.delete:
delete from tb_enforce_entrust where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.id id, t1.name name, t1.task_id taskId, t1.cid cid, t1.organ_id organId, t1.contacter contacter, t1.contact_phone contactPhone, t1.contact_address contactAddress, t1.postcode postcode, t1.import_date importDate, t1.proposer proposer, t1.propose_date proposeDate, t1.receiver receiver, t1.receive_date receiveDate, t1.attachment attachment, t1.if_over ifOver, t1.if_enforce ifEnforce, t1.update_time updateTime, (select t2.task_name from tb_task t2 where t2.id = t1.task_id) taskName, (select t3.c_name from tb_company t3 where t3.c_id = t1.cid) companyName, (select t4.name from tb_examine_organ t4 where t4.id = t1.organ_id) organName FROM tb_enforce_entrust t1 WHERE t1.task_id = #{taskId}
